pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Meta-Analysis with Publications Bias and P-Hacking // Tools for Bayesian estimation of meta-analysis models that account for publications bias or p-hacking. For publication bias, this package implements a variant of the p-value based selection model of Hedges (1992) doi:10.1214/ss/1177011364 with discrete selection probabilities. It also implements the mixture of truncated normals model for p-hacking described in Moss and De Bin (2019) arXiv:1911.12445.
